title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experiences.
fullDescription: This portfolio website is built using Svelte, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. It features a clean and modern design, responsive layout, and smooth animations. The website includes sections for about me, skills, projects, and contact information. It also has a gallery showcasing screenshots of my projects.

title: DaichiNo
description: DaichiNo is a Japanese restaurant website that provides information about the menu, location, and reservations.
fullDescription: DaichiNo is a fully responsive website built with PHP and Laravel for the backend, and JavaScript with React.js for the frontend. The website features an interactive menu, location map, and online reservation system. It is designed to provide a seamless user experience across all devices.

title: Kopi Hari Ini
description: Kopi Hari Ini is a coffee shop management system that helps manage orders and inventory.
fullDescription: Kopi Hari Ini is developed using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. The system allows coffee shop owners to efficiently manage customer orders, track inventory levels, and generate sales reports. The user-friendly interface ensures that staff can quickly navigate through the system to enhance operational efficiency.

title: Gearnix Store
description: Gearnix Store is an e-commerce platform for selling gaming accessories.
fullDescription: Gearnix Store is built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to provide a seamless shopping experience for gamers. The platform features a wide range of gaming accessories, secure payment options, and an easy-to-navigate interface. Customers can browse products, read reviews, and make purchases with ease.

title: Creative CV
description: Creative CV is my online resume. It showcases my skills and experiences, in a visually appealing way.
fullDescription: Creative CV is my online resume. It showcases my skills and experiences, in a visually appealing way.

title: Digital Clock
description: Digital Clock is a very simple application that displays the current time and updates every second.
fullDescription: Digital Clock is a very simple application that displays the current time and updates every second.

title: PasarKu
description: PasarKu is a simple marketplace application that connects buyers and sellers in a local community.
fullDescription: PasarKu is a simple marketplace application that connects buyers and sellers in a local community.
